title: Predicting effects of noncoding variants with deep learning–based sequence model

tldr.text: A deep learning–based algorithmic framework, DeepSEA, is developed that directly learns a regulatory sequence code from large-scale chromatin-profiling data, enabling prediction of chromatin effects of sequence alterations with single-nucleotide sensitivity and improving prioritization of functional variants.
